content: the hawthorne tee is a light airy and flattering v neck crochet top for summer with endless possibilities to customise it to suit your individual shape the innovative sleeve and neckline construction gives you the option to easily adapt them and try on as you make to decide exactly how you d like to style it made from the top down so you can try on as you make this tee is a delight to make and wear too the pattern is size inclusive from xs-5x and includes a section on customising your top and comes with a free video tutorial too the pattern is an intermediate level but the tutorials and videos mean that a confident beginner could also enjoy and create this pattern find a free version of this pattern on my blog here 2 what s included a six-page pdf written in us and uk terms video tutorial schematic stitch chart technique and resizing guide pattern support of you need or would like it difficulty is intermediate materials and tools hook 4 5mm/g+ crochet hook yarn hawthorne fingering yarn by wecrochet approx balls/yards 3/830 3/920 3/1040 4/1150 4/1260 5/1380 5/1500 6/1630 6/1740 please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out you are welcome to use this pattern for personal and commercial use to make and sell your finished items credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated i d love you to join me at www hanjancrochet com 3 and share my free patterns and tutorials with you - technical information file format this crochet pattern is provided as a digital pdf file only no physical copy of the pattern or finished item will be supplied by purchasing and downloading this pattern you agree to the following below file size under 20mb device/software compatibility compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers internet requirements an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase usage instructions download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section - usage instructions complete your purchase on this platform download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions required tools see materials needed - safety and compliance compliance this pattern complies with the general product safety regulation gpsr and other applicable eu directives precautions not suitable for children under 16 without adult supervision ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase disclaimer this product is for educational and personal use only -
